description:
Experience superior comfort with the Saylor Desk Chair. Its generously padded foam seat and backrest offer a plush, sink-in feel that supports you through long hours of work or study.

Crafted with a reinforced hardwood frame for lasting stability, this chair features a smooth 360-degree swivel and a height-adjustable design from 33.5\" to 37.4\" to perfectly fit your desk.
title: Saylor Ergonomic Swivel Desk Chair

description:
Meet the Dispatch Bookcase: a masterclass in handcrafted furniture. Built from solid Mindi wood and finished by hand, each piece features unique, artisanal distressing and is accented with gleaming solid brass hardware. This is more than storage; it's a statement of enduring style.

Designed for both beauty and function, it includes three adjustable shelves and smooth, full-extension drawer glides. With a generous 34\"W x 15\"D x 54.75\"H cavity, it offers ample space to display your favorite reads and treasures.

Key Features:
• Handcrafted from solid Mindi wood & veneers
• Three adjustable shelves (30 lb. capacity each)
• Distressed hand-applied finish & solid brass hardware
• Easy to clean with soap and water
title: Handcrafted Mindi Wood Bookcase

description:
Turn the handle and watch this desk rise from 30" to 42"—no motors, just smooth mechanical muscle. A crystal-clear tempered-glass top floats above rugged reclaimed-wood legs, marrying factory grit with gallery gloss.

Built to shoulder 250 lb of monitors, models, or midnight manuscripts, the steel crank still glides like butter. Pick the 47" compact or the 59" wide canvas and make standing or sitting your choice, not a chore.

Want a metal top instead? Chat us live and we’ll forge a custom piece from our recycled steel collection.
title: Crank Up Glass & Reclaimed Wood Desk

description:
Elevate your workspace with the Tatum Executive Desk, a masterpiece of form and function. Handcrafted by skilled Indonesian artisans from solid ash wood, this desk brings timeless elegance and enduring strength to your office.

The rich grain of the ash wood is protected by a clear lacquer finish, providing a durable surface with a beautiful, subtle sheen. Its crowning glory is the premium leather writing surface, offering a luxurious and tactile experience for every task.
title: Tatum Solid Ash Executive Desk

description:
Glide through your workday on Elise. A powder-coated aluminum frame gives this modern desk chair its sleek edge, while the smooth swivel and silent casters keep you effortlessly mobile.

Tap the lever and the hydraulic lift floats you to the perfect height, whether you're typing, sketching, or video-calling. Durable texture meets minimalist design—ready for home offices, studios, and creative corners.
title: Elise Swivel Desk Chair

description:
Turn the corner into command central. This sleek workstation hides a power strip, supply stash, and lockable legal/letter files inside a space-saving wedge that hugs walls and opens up floor space.

Write, charge, and file without leaving your seat: a leather-lined side drawer flips into a jotting surface, the center drawer drops for keyboard or tablet, and twin trays lift out to corral clutter. Finished in rich wood tones, it looks sharp from every angle—even when the cables and paperwork aren’t.

Quick specs: 75¾"W x 20"D return, 28"W opening, center drawer 16"D, 25"H clearance.
title: Dispatch Corner Desk with Hidden Storage

description:
Own a slice of European history. The Grady desk wraps a sleek waterfall silhouette in centuries-old oak rescued from weathered barn beams, so every saw mark and resin-filled crack tells its own story.

Hand-sanded, glazed, and sealed matte, the wood glows with depth that only time can create. Two soft-close drawers float on hidden glides, keeping your workspace calm and cable-free.

Available in Northman Oak, Sable, or Cinder finishes. Sustainably sourced solid oak and veneers complete the frame—no two desks ever match, but every one is built to last another hundred years.
title: Grady Reclaimed Oak Waterfall Desk

description:
Command your workday from a desk that means business. Solid white oak, wire-brushed and hand-stained, delivers heirloom strength with a timeworn soul. Brass pulls glide open four quiet drawers, while a hidden channel keeps cables invisible and your surface serene.

Designed to stand alone or anchor the full Atlas modular suite, this piece sits flush against the wall, turning even tight corners into executive territory. Build the office you deserve—one impeccable component at a time.
title: Atlas White Oak Executive Desk

description:
Meet the desk that makes work feel like a luxury. Warm walnut or oak tops float above a brass-kissed steel base, while shagreen-embossed leather panels add quiet texture under your fingertips.

Hand-stained hardwood, soft-close dovetail drawers, and a lacquer finish built for daily brilliance—this is craftsmanship you can see and feel. Choose Dark Walnut on parawood or Flemish Natural on solid oak; both arrive ready to elevate any room.

Note: Reconstituted leather surface is excluded from Worry-Free Protection Plan.
title: Callahan Walnut & Brass Writing Desk

description:
Handcrafted by Indonesian artisans, the Tatum desk turns solid ash into a workspace you’ll actually want to use. A clear lacquer finish lets the grain glow while shielding it from coffee rings and brainstorm scuffs.

The inset leather surface invites pen on paper, mouse on pad, or laptop on hide—no slip, no scratch, all style. One piece, zero assembly: just unbox and start creating.
title: Tatum Ash Wood Writing Desk with Leather Top

description:
Command your office with the Foundry Desk, a masterpiece of solid mahogany and ash crafted by hand in Indonesia. Sustainably sourced wood and solid iron hardware create a foundation of enduring quality and subtle rustic charm.

Each desk is unique, featuring the natural character of wood grain, small knots, and organic splits. These aren't flaws; they're a signature of its artisanal origin, ensuring your workspace tells a story all its own.
title: Foundry Executive Desk Handcrafted Mahogany
